EmailTemplate.subject: Wistia Video
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi FirstName, This is OwnerFullName, from Wistia - the best video marketing platform in the known universe. I would love to connect by phone soon, so I can walk you through a few different ways Wistia could be helping increase your leads, identify your most interested prospects, and connect with your existing customers. To give you a peek into what Wistia can do for you, and how the product works, watch the video below. Talk soon! OwnerFullName team wistia Please Select a Video from the Right
